member.name: D2D1_TRANSFORMED_IMAGE_SOURCE_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Properties of a transformed image source.

member.name: D2D1_TRANSFORMED_IMAGE_SOURCE_PROPERTIES.orientation
member.summary: The orientation at which the image source is drawn.

member.name: D2D1_TRANSFORMED_IMAGE_SOURCE_PROPERTIES.scaleX
member.summary: The horizontal scale factor at which the image source is drawn.

member.name: D2D1_TRANSFORMED_IMAGE_SOURCE_PROPERTIES.scaleY
member.summary: The vertical scale factor at which the image source is drawn.

member.name: D2D1_TRANSFORMED_IMAGE_SOURCE_PROPERTIES.interpolationMode
member.summary: The interpolation mode used when the image source is drawn. This is ignored if the image source is drawn using the DrawImage method, or using an image brush.
